thread.title: Toggas left his mark on wrestling
thread.title_full: Toggas left his mark on wrestling

author: JOSH MARTIN Times Sports Editor
title: Toggas left his mark on wrestling
text:
Toggas left his mark on wrestling BY JOSH MARTIN Times Sports Editor Gettysburg Times | 0 comments 
After learning of the passing of legendary wrestling coach John Toggas earlier this week I immediately recalled a moment years ago when I was sitting at my desk, ready to begin a night in the office. I was going through my mail, and came across an envelope with distinctive hand writing across the front. Inside was a printed card with a black and white etching of a pair of well-worn wrestling shoes and taped-up headgear resting on a mat. The image brought to mind the end of a long and grueling practice with everything including the equipment left out on the mat. 
I had never seen such a card but was instantly intrigued by what could be inside, and who had been the sender. kAmxE H2D 7C@> |C] %@882D[ 2? :4@?:4 7:8FC6 :?
